description:
Mötley Crüe have once again been hit by claims of fakery - this time over Esteemed guitarist and friend John 5's alleged air guitar technique. He says it's simply not true and if he says that, I believe him. 

Footnote - more apologies for the in-video, video blur; we were hit with YouTube's red card over background copyright issues.  
 
For Behind The Scenes footage or to talk to me in a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

I'm on tour with The Darkness - find out where in Europe: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory.com/

Join my special Mailing List here: https://beacons.ai/justinhawkins

To listen to previous episodes of Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0hQYjIww4Rfaka9Fqc11mX?si=ab25d61ba0c74618

#reaction #review #mötleycrüe
title: More Fake News about  Mötley Crüe!
